wordpressPost.title: Frank Ocean cancels mid-show
wordpressPost.excerpt: Unfortunately, Frank Ocean had to cancel his afternoon concert after just 15 minutes due to acute problems with his voice. We deeply apologise for the inconvenience this may have caused.
wordpressPost.content: Unfortunately, Frank Ocean had to cancel his afternoon concert after just 15 minutes due to acute problems with his voice. We deeply apologise for the inconvenience this may have caused.
